titleStmt.title: A replye to an ansvvere made of M. Doctor VVhitgifte Against the admonition to the Parliament. By T.C.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Whitgift, John. An answere to a certen libel intituled, An admonition to the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the Yale University. Library.
